column5: A stunning mediation on love and time.

This is not our story.  A beautiful yet equally tragic mediation on love. Inseparable lovers that simply do not work together. The novel The Mill On The Floss is a very strong companion piece to this film.

A very difficult watch, but necessary for the character dynamics and themes. 
The idea of “heartbreak incarnate” and that kind of addictive personality is extremely powerful.
The allegory is powerful, but the ideas on self-love are perhaps more important.
The pain from all the things that were left unsaid
